mapper.select: select t1.id as id,t1.sightId as sightId,t1.*,t2.* from t_sightinfo as t1 join t_sightupdateinfo as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId where t1.id=#{id}
select t1.id as id,t1.sightId as sightId,t1.*,t2.* from t_sightinfo as t1 join t_sightupdateinfo as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId where t1.sightId=#{sightId}
select t1.id as id,t1.sightId as sightId,t1.*,t2.* from t_sightinfo as t1 join t_sightupdateinfo as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId limit #{offset},#{size}
SELECT sightName,star,city,saleCount FROM t_sightinfo as t1 INNER JOIN t_sightmonthlysalecount as t2 on t1.sightId=t2.sightId ORDER BY saleCount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT province FROM t_sightinfo GROUP BY province
SELECT city,COUNT(DISTINCT sightId) as value FROM t_sightinfo GROUP BY city
SELECT star,COUNT(DISTINCT sightId) as value FROM t_sightinfo GROUP BY star
SELECT star,SUM(saleCount) as value FROM t_sightinfo INNER JOIN t_sightmonthlysalecount WHERE t_sightinfo.sightId=t_sightmonthlysalecount.sightId GROUP BY star
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t1.sightId) as value FROM t_sightinfo as t1 INNER JOIN t_sightupdateinfo as t2 ON t1.sightId=t2.sightId WHERE qunarPrice BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT city,COUNT(CASE WHEN star is NULL THEN '1' END ) as 其它,COUNT(CASE WHEN star='3A' THEN '1' END ) as 3A,COUNT(CASE WHEN star='4A' THEN '1' END ) as 4A,COUNT(CASE WHEN star='5A' THEN '1' END ) as 5A FROM t_sightinfo GROUP BY city ORDER BY COUNT(sightId) DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT city,SUM(saleCount) as value FROM t_sightinfo INNER JOIN t_sightmonthlysalecount on t_sightinfo.sightId=t_sightmonthlysalecount.sightId GROUP BY city ORDER BY SUM(saleCount) DESC LIMIT 5
